Name: Dungeon in a Bottle
About the game: Dungeon in a Bottle is a precision platformer about choosing the right kind of jump in claustrophobic situations. The acrobatic thief, Reya, has gotten himself trapped in a magic bottle, and now he must use every jump at his disposal to escape the treacherous dungeon within! Hopefully he'll grab some treasure while he's at it. Perform difficult jumps while getting crushed by spikes, smashed by walls, and dissolved in goop in this platformer that takes the genre in a unique direction.
